GSD.description:
pinctrl: meditatek: Startup with the IRQs disabled

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.228 by commit b439b12d105073ab64ac9b0a7700207a43d208c6. For more details please see the references link.
